title: Minisuka Police (2004) DVD 04 of 10 DVDRip OGM Japanese
description:
HOW TO PLAY THE FILES

You may do either of the following:

a) Use VLC ( http://www.videolan.org/vlc/ )
b) Use MPlayer plus codecs ( http://www.mplayerhq.hu/design7/dload.html )
c) If you prefer to use Windows Media Player or any other DirectShow players, you
   must install the following codecs:
   * OGM codec ( http://www.free-codecs.com/download/RadLight_Ogg_Media_DirectShow_filter.htm )
   * FFMPEG MPEG-4 codec ( http://www.free-codecs.com/download/FFDShow.htm )



ABOUT THE CONTENT
??!??????? (2004)
Let's Go! Minisuka Police (2004) - Best episodes collection, DVD 4 of 10.


Starring:

????? Kaori Ohhara
????   Meri Mishou
????   Chinatsu Yoshinaga

Language: Japanese, no subtitles


Background:

This is a sort of a late-night reality/gag TV show featuring models dressed in sexy police uniform, wearing short skirts ("minisuka" refers to "miniskirt").

The models are assigned to do various tasks ranging from playing games to doing sexy poses to catching lizards -- anything that makes them accidentally expose their underwear. This is the ultimate upskirts show. ("Upskirt" is "panchira" (????) in Japanese).

As of this writing, there are 13 batches in all. The first batch was shown in 1996.


This is the 4th DVD from the 10-DVD Minisuka Police box set. It features the top three best episodes from the fourth season of the show, plus extras.
